title: The Escape
body:
I need to find a way out, otherwise I won't be able to make it...I can't let everything we've been working towards be for nothing! I think I've found a way to get out of this lab though.....maybe the rocket we have?
	Or the emergency sub?
	Maybe I can dig a tunnel with spoons.....I don't know. I'll have to figure it out later, for now I've escaped the inital sub-level blast wave, but this place is going to collapse soon. - Dr. Wynter, Log #3
